query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `snapshot_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `scheduleName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('daily','weekly','biweekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
  `timeOfDay` varchar(5) NOT NULL,
  `dayOfWeek` int,
  `dayOfMonth` int,
  `targetType` enum('all_templates','specific_templates','active_templates') NOT NULL,
  `targetTemplateIds` text,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `lastExecutedAt` timestamp,
  `nextExecutionAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `executionCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `snapshot_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)
command:

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `scheduleName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('daily','weekly','biweekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
  `timeOfDay` varchar(5) NOT NULL,
  `dayOfWeek` int,
  `dayOfMonth` int,
  `targetType` enum('all_templates','specific_templates','active_templates') NOT NULL,
  `targetTemplateIds` text,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `lastExecutedAt` timestamp,
  `nextExecutionAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `executionCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `snapshot_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)
